title: My Art Journey
script:
Anushka: Namaste dosto! Aaj main aap sabse apni kala yatra ke baare mein kuch baatein karna chahti hoon.

Anushka: Meri shuruwat? Bas ek pencil aur kagaz. Bachpan mein, har cheez jo dekhti, use bana daalti thi.

Anushka: Phir bade hote hote, rang mile, canvas mila... ek naya hi jahan khul gaya.

Anushka: Kai baar laga, yeh kya kar rahi hoon main? Samajh nahi aa raha, achcha nahi ban raha.

Anushka: Par pata hai? Haar nahi maani. Kyunki jab main rang bharti hoon na, toh main 'main' hoti hoon.

Anushka: Har brushstroke ek kahani hai, har rang ek ehsaas. Meri kahani, mere ehsaas.

Anushka: Aaj jab main apni paintings dekhti hoon, toh mujhe apni mehnat dikhti hai, apna pyaar dikhta hai.

Anushka: Aur main samajhti hoon ki yeh toh bas shuruaat hai. Art meri zindagi hai, aur meri zindagi toh abhi shuru hui hai!

Anushka: Toh, aap bhi apni kala ko pehchano, aur rang bhar do! Dhanyavaad!
